name: My name ?
description:
Your name ?

Your name ? is a little puzzle game about the life of a man that doesn't remember who is he.  Travel through different ages of his life to find out his name.

We made the game under 72 hours for the 48th Ludum Dare jam : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/my-name

The theme was "Deeper and deeper"

To have a better experience it is advised to play with audio and in full screen

//Note : the game takes a few seconds before starting

Here is the soluce in video.
